languages.text: "Теперь я вижу, что был{mf||а} слеп{mf||а}, ибо моими руками ксеносы воевали друг с другом все это время".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь я вижу, что был{mf||а} слеп{mf||а}, ибо моими руками ксеносы воевали друг с другом все это время".

languages.text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
languages.original_text: "Теперь я вижу, что был{mf||а} слеп{mf||а}, ибо моими руками ксеносы воевали друг с другом все это время".

traits.locale_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time, and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
"Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time, and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
"Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
"Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
"Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."
"Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

languages.text: « Je me rends compte à présent que j'ai été aveugle. Les xénos se sont livré des guerres intestines pendant tout ce temps, et j'étais leur pion malgré moi. »
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: « Je me rends compte à présent que j'ai été aveugle. Les xénos se sont livré des guerres intestines pendant tout ce temps, et j'étais leur pion malgré moi. »

languages.text: “现在我明白了，那些异形一直都在自相残杀，而我在不知情的情况下成了他们的帮凶。”
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: “现在我明白了，那些异形一直都在自相残杀，而我在不知情的情况下成了他们的帮凶。”

languages.text: 「自分が何も見えていなかったことに今気付いたよ。異種族たちはずっと争っていて、私は知らず知らずのうちに彼らの手先になっていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: 「自分が何も見えていなかったことに今気付いたよ。異種族たちはずっと争っていて、私は知らず知らずのうちに彼らの手先になっていたんだ」

languages.text: "Jetzt erkenne ich, dass ich blind war. Die Xenos haben die ganze Zeit über gegeneinander gekämpft und ich war dabei {mf|ihr ahnungsloser Handlanger|ihre ahnungslose Handlangerin}."
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt erkenne ich, dass ich blind war. Die Xenos haben die ganze Zeit über gegeneinander gekämpft und ich war dabei {mf|ihr ahnungsloser Handlanger|ihre ahnungslose Handlangerin}."

languages.text: «Ahora me doy cuenta de lo {mf|ciego|ciega} que he estado. Los xenos han estado luchando entre ellos todo este tiempo y yo he sido su marioneta de manera involuntaria».
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora me doy cuenta de lo {mf|ciego|ciega} que he estado. Los xenos han estado luchando entre ellos todo este tiempo y yo he sido su marioneta de manera involuntaria».

languages.text: "Artık ne kadar kör olduğumu görebiliyorum. Bunca zamandır zenolar birbirleriyle savaşıyormuş, ben de farkında olmadan onların oyuncağı olmuşum."
languages.original_text: "Now I see that I have been blind. The xenos have been fighting one another all this time and I was their unwitting cat's paw."

traits.locale_text: "Artık ne kadar kör olduğumu görebiliyorum. Bunca zamandır zenolar birbirleriyle savaşıyormuş ve ben de farkında olmadan onların oyuncağı olmuşum."
